str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) trans: I hand in, give up, (b) intrans: I give way (to the wind). From epi and didomi; to give over.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A part, portion, share. From an obsolete but more primary form of meiromai; a division or share.
Roasted, broiled. From an obsolete verb akin to hepso; cooked, i.e. Roasted.
A fish. Of uncertain affinity; a fish.
